name: Tank (itch) (Eden Losycer)
description: Tank. This is a two-player game. You have to fight each other as you move around a maze filled with mines as tanks within a 60 second time limit. Use the W A S D keys and SPACEBAR controls for Player 1 (Red) and UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT arrow keys and QUESTION/SLASH key for Player 2 (Blue). WATCH OUT FOR THE MINES! You can run into them to gain 1 point to your score and then you can move around the maze to get your opponent/enemy tank. Have fun playing this game!
